txt.en: 'I have sent word to some of our neighbours that we are resuming production.\n\n'If you are headed for Lamedon, could you speak to a cooper friend of mine, Rusgwen? She would be happy to learn that we are back in business.'
Lumber is beginning to move out of the Ringló Vale. Best inform the neighbouring regions of this development.

You deliver a condensed version of what transpired with Dravron in the Ringló Vale, and that Dornach sends his regards.

'I am glad that tale ended well, and I am glad that Dornach finds himself in good spirits! Perhaps he will be inclined to offer me a discount on my next order.

'Ah, but where are my manners? I have yet to properly introduce myself...'
Dornach asked you to tell Rusgwen in Calembel that the lumber camp is up and running again.\n\nTalk to Rusgwen in Calembel.
